metadata.title: CVE-2020-11869 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An integer overflow was found in QEMU 4.0.1 through 4.2.0 in the way itimplemented ATI VGA emulation. This flaw occurs in the ati_2d_blt() routinein hw/display/ati-2d.c while handling MMIO write operations through theati_mm_write() callback. A malicious guest could abuse this flaw to crashthe QEMU process, resulting in a denial of service.

criterions.comment: qemu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
